snippet: President Barack Obama took his criticism of congressional Republicans to a higher pitch on Wednesday, imploring them to  "stop just hatin' all the time" as they voted to sue him over charges he has overstepped the bounds of his office....

headline.print_headline: Obama to Republicans: ‘Stop Just Hatin’ All the Time’
headline.main: Obama to Republicans: ‘Stop Just Hatin’ All the Time’

lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama took his criticism of congressional Republicans to a higher pitch on Wednesday, imploring them to  "stop just hatin' all the time" as they voted to sue him over charges he has overstepped the bounds of his office.
